Human.Ability Score Increase: +1 to all ability scores (Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma)
Human.Size: Medium. Height ranges between 5 and 6 feet.
Languages: One extra language of your choice

Gnome.Size: Small. Gnomes are around 3 to 4 feet tall.

Race Features.Darkvision: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
Race Features.Gnome Cunning: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

Elf.Size: Medium. Standing between 5 and 6 feet tall.

Race Features.Darkvision: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.
Race Features.Keen Senses: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.
Race Features.Fey Ancestry: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.
Race Features.Trance: Elves don’t sleep but instead meditate deeply for 4 hours a day.

Race Features.Lucky: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.
Race Features.Brave: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
Race Features.Halfling Nimbleness: You can move through the space of any creature that is larger than you.
